pages.text: One notable ability of Vagrants is their ability to synthesize parasite tissue using a Factory and a cutting implement, such as a Sword. This behavior appears to be an alternative to killing other parasite instances.
The process does not appear to cause the Factory pain, and it only appears to need a fraction of the flesh content for the species sampled.

It also appears to be capable of synthesizing certain tissues that would otherwise be impractical or even impossible to harvest via an instance corpse. In rare cases, the resulting items may even originate from a parasite's Sane variant, such as Ender Pearls.
